verses.verse: Surely <WH3426> there is a vein <WH4161> for the silver <WH3701>, and a place <WH4725> for gold <WH2091> where they fine <WH2212> it. vein: or, mine
Iron <WH1270> is taken <WH3947> out of the earth <WH6083>, and brass <WH5154> is molten <WH6694> out of the stone <WH68>. earth: or, dust
He setteth <WH7760> an end <WH7093> to darkness <WH2822>, and searcheth out <WH2713> all perfection <WH8503>: the stones <WH68> of darkness <WH652>, and the shadow of death <WH6757>.

The flood <WH5158> breaketh out <WH6555> from the inhabitant <WH1481>; even the waters forgotten <WH7911> of the foot <WH7272>: they are dried up <WH1809>, they are gone away <WH5128> from men <WH582>.
As for the earth <WH776>, out of it cometh <WH3318> bread <WH3899>: and under it is turned up <WH2015> as it were fire <WH784>.
The stones <WH68> of it are the place <WH4725> of sapphires <WH5601>: and it hath dust <WH6083> of gold <WH2091>. dust: or, gold ore
There is a path <WH5410> which no fowl <WH5861> knoweth <WH3045>, and which the vulture's <WH344> eye <WH5869> hath not seen <WH7805>:
The lion's <WH7830> whelps <WH1121> have not trodden <WH1869> it, nor the fierce lion <WH7826> passed <WH5710> by it.
He putteth forth <WH7971> his hand <WH3027> upon the rock <WH2496>; he overturneth <WH2015> the mountains <WH2022> by the roots <WH8328>. rock: or, flint
He cutteth out <WH1234> rivers <WH2975> among the rocks <WH6697>; and his eye <WH5869> seeth <WH7200> every precious thing <WH3366>.
He bindeth <WH2280> the floods <WH5104> from overflowing <WH1065>; and the thing that is hid <WH8587> bringeth he forth <WH3318> to light <WH216>. overflowing: Heb. weeping
But where <WH370> shall wisdom <WH2451> be found <WH4672>? and where is the place <WH4725> of understanding <WH998>?
Man <WH582> knoweth <WH3045> not the price <WH6187> thereof; neither is it found <WH4672> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
The depth <WH8415> saith <WH559>, It is not in me: and the sea <WH3220> saith <WH559>, It is not with me.
It cannot be gotten <WH5414> for gold <WH5458>, neither shall silver <WH3701> be weighed <WH8254> for the price <WH4242> thereof. It: Heb. Fine gold shall not be given for it
It cannot be valued <WH5541> with the gold <WH3800> of Ophir <WH211>, with the precious <WH3368> onyx <WH7718>, or the sapphire <WH5601>.
The gold <WH2091> and the crystal <WH2137> cannot equal <WH6186> it: and the exchange <WH8545> of it shall not be for jewels <WH3627> of fine gold <WH6337>. jewels: or, vessels of
No mention <WH2142> shall be made of coral <WH7215>, or of pearls <WH1378>: for the price <WH4901> of wisdom <WH2451> is above rubies <WH6443>. coral: or, Ramoth
The topaz <WH6357> of Ethiopia <WH3568> shall not equal <WH6186> it, neither shall it be valued <WH5541> with pure <WH2889> gold <WH3800>.
Whence <WH370> then cometh <WH935> wisdom <WH2451>? and where is the place <WH4725> of understanding <WH998>?
Seeing it is hid <WH5956> from the eyes <WH5869> of all living <WH2416>, and kept close <WH5641> from the fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>. air: or, heaven
Destruction <WH11> and death <WH4194> say <WH559>, We have heard <WH8085> the fame <WH8088> thereof with our ears <WH241>.
God <WH430> understandeth <WH995> the way <WH1870> thereof, and he knoweth <WH3045> the place <WH4725> thereof.
For he looketh <WH5027> to the ends <WH7098> of the earth <WH776>, and seeth <WH7200> under the whole heaven <WH8064>;
To make <WH6213> the weight <WH4948> for the winds <WH7307>; and he weigheth <WH8505> the waters <WH4325> by measure <WH4060>.
When he made <WH6213> a decree <WH2706> for the rain <WH4306>, and a way <WH1870> for the lightning <WH2385> of the thunder <WH6963>:
Then did he see <WH7200> it, and declare <WH5608> it; he prepared <WH3559> it, yea, and searched it out <WH2713>. declare: or, number it
And unto man <WH120> he said <WH559>, Behold, the fear <WH3374> of the Lord <WH136>, that is wisdom <WH2451>; and to depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451> is understanding <WH998>.
